Hydras:

"I see" ??Hydras typed some buttopns sending a beep messaagne in a 
asort of Morse Code in order to call his preds. 


OOC: this way is an ancient and secret comunication process and often 
they use them use it in case of emergency


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Dreadplague: I will transmit the coordinates now. (She touches her 
> armored skin and transmits the data.) I need one of your men now, 
> though. We cannot proceed without, and time is short.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > "Where will be the location of the gun???"asked Hydras
> >

> > > Dreadplague: We are starting to build our defense system 
against

so
